Dialog_line.line: Once upon a time, in a far, far universe, there were 2 worlds
This is Fruity-Veggie world and Insect world
In Fruity-Veggie world, all the fruits and vegetables enjoyed peace under the ruling of King Guava
King Guava had a beautiful wife named Queen Bitter Gourd.
But one day, the queen realized that she cannot give birth to a child
because of this, she ran away and left the Fruity-Veggie palace.
while crying on a faraway lake, the insect queen approached her and said
"In my world I can grant you the ability to give birth", Queen Bitter Gourd agreed immediately
But suddenly, she was hypnotized! "I will use you to fight the King then Fruity-Veggie World will be mine!"
After that, Queen Bitter Gourd commanded the insects to start invading Fruity-Veggie World.
